Text:
function EP03_27()
    --.結-2【9月第4週】「百合愛学園文化祭」
    SaveData.Title = "百合愛学園文化祭"

    --//BG：メインストリート（学園祭）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019de")
	LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-600,0)
	LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,600,0,30000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ As I passed through the school gate, the entire campus was already dyed with a festive atmosphere. ]])

    MSG([[ Although it wasn’t officially the opening time for the food stalls yet, some had already begun cooking, and promo mascots had started wandering around. ]])

    MSG([[ Being swept up in this unique school festival vibe, even my mood—which had been down because I was worried about Akira—was inevitably lifted. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t be the one to ruin this atmosphere. I don’t really feel like enjoying it, but I’ll try to keep a smile as much as possible. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Oh, it’s Princess Erika! Hey, try this! Seafood yakisoba, free sample!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Thanks to my dad’s connections, we got a mountain of salmon roe for this super deluxe yakisoba!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0706.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh! W-well, then I’ll have some..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ They forcibly handed me a plate of yakisoba, so I decided to accept it. ]])

    --//SE：麺をすする音
PLAY_SE("SEa028.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0707.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "D-delicious! I’ve never had yakisoba with salmon roe before, but since the seasoning is mild, the saltiness of the fish eggs goes perfectly with it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0708.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Also, the finely cut squid mixed in is wonderful. The chewy texture of this squid adds a great accent, making it a high-quality dish you wouldn’t expect from a food stall." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0709.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you for the meal." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Did everyone hear that? Princess Erika is totally satisfied! Seafood yakisoba for sale at 600 yen!" ]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｂ・Ｃ
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Hey you all! Making Princess Erika eat it just to promote the stall is despicable, don’t you think?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Here, Princess Erika. Please quench your salty throat with this royal milk tea with tapioca." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Using plenty of handmade tapioca that my father’s connections got from the super popular Shibuya shop—this is our proud specialty." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0710.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yes, then I’ll have some." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ They forcibly handed me the cup and brought a straw to my mouth, so I drank the milk tea as they said. ]])
    --//SE：飲む音（ごくり）
PLAY_SE("SEa010.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0711.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "D-delicious! The moment I tasted it, the rich flavor of the tea leaves spread throughout my mouth, and the gentle sweetness of the milk wrapped it all up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0712.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "And above all, this tapioca. It’s more elastic than anything I’ve ever tried, and it slides down the throat so smoothly I can’t stop." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0713.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you for the meal. It was delicious." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Did everyone hear that? The royal tapioca milk tea that Princess Erika is also totally satisfied with will be sold for 500 yen!" ]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "N-no sneaking ahead—that’s unfair!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "We have to get Princess Erika to eat ours too!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Wait up, Sister Erika!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0714.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-wait! I’m sorry! I have to get to my own class!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    MSG([[ While somehow dodging the approaching crowd, I gradually made my way toward the school building. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m not the only one whose tension is rising. The whole school is reaching its peak excitement for the festival. ]])
    --//BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I finally reached the very front of the building. At this pace, it looks like I can make it without the upperclassmen catching up. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as I was feeling relieved—the next moment, despair blocked my path. ]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｄ・Ｅ・Ｇ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB10aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB09aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Princess Erika, we’ve been waiting for you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Please come see our class’s attraction." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Ufufufu. Even if you don’t want to, you’ll come to see it <sprite="Emoji" name="note">." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0715.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eek!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The entrance to the building was blocked by students. It looks like they were lying in wait. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t use arrest techniques on these innocent girls. But if I don’t do something, the upperclassmen will catch up. What should I do...! ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0353.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Bow your heads, you weeds!" ]])

LAYER_EFFECT(50 ,6 ,30,30,500,false)
LAYER_EFFECT(55 ,6 ,30,30,500,false)
LAYER_EFFECT(60 ,6 ,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Students】
 "Aahhhhhh!?" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    --//BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The students blocking the way suddenly dropped to their knees, and Lira-san stepped forward from behind them. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0354.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I thought you’d be late, but you got held up by these weeds? Buck up, Battle Princess." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0716.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Lira-san!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira-san’s special skill, where her charisma makes others obey her— ‘<r=リライティング>I’m the boss</r>’. ]])

    MSG([[ She won against me in the last Princess Election, but no matter how many times I see her power, it’s incredible. Really, how did I win back then... three months ago? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0717.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you so much, you really saved me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0355.wav")

    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "See? Your ‘knights’ are waiting, so let’s hurry upstairs." ]])

    MSG([[ Then, I hurried up to the fourth floor, where my class was, together with Lira-san. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ By the time I reached the classroom, it was almost time for the Shirahisai festival to open. ]])

    MSG([[ Our class had already finished final checks on scripts and props, fully prepared. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0718.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sorry I’m late. Looks like the preparations are already done." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：オウガ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0233.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Don’t worry about it. Actually, Erika-san usually works too hard, so before the Princess Election, you should take it easy." ]])

    --//BU：オウガ（笑顔）、ヒユ（笑顔）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0257.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "What Ouga said. We’ll handle the preparations, so Sister, please enjoy freely walking around the Shirahisai." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0258.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Once the Princess Election starts, you’ll be busy getting ready for your performances, so you probably won’t get much time to look around." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0069.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Now, leave this to us and enjoy yourself fully. Surely there’s someone you want to walk around with, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0719.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-well! I-I understand, if you all insist that much." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I was practically pushed out of the classroom. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone must be worried about me. If I push myself any more, it’ll only make them sad, so I’ll accept their kindness and walk around the Shirahisai. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0720.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Someone I want to walk around with, huh." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That’s probably the most important person to me right now. ]])

    MSG([[ I closed my eyes and thought seriously. ]])

    MSG([[ Then what came to mind was— ]])

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_28")

end
